# Linux

## Prerequisite

- known unix tree filesystem
- skilled with bash
- cpu, memory, disk, network basics
- make yourself love command line interface

## Namespace Isolation

- IPC (pod shared)
- PID (pod shared)
- NET (pod shared)
- UTS (pod shared)
- FS

## Frequently used tools to dig into container world

- nsenter
- tcpdump
- crictl/docker
- ip
- top/htop
- kill/killall
